help-description.english:
Hello! My name is {{bot_name}}, but that I think you already know!

I'm a bot that might be able to entertain, help you manage your server, and do waaay more things!

But remember, I'm still at active development, so I might not be able to do everything I'm supposed to.

If you have any questions, feel free to open an Issue on my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Tockawa/Apple-Pie-Bot)! I am also open to any feedback you might have! Just do the same as opening an Issue!

I hope you enjoy using me!
